name: Tank 57 Brother's Revenge
description:
Five years has past since the last battle. Now that Mind Game is dead, his brother, Code name: Shadow Storm wants revenge. Tank 57 and his team will take on another battle to end this war...once and for all. Click on the Amazon link below, to download MC Games to your Android device.

Update 6/17/18 Note: Due to Google apps running in the background crashes may occur. Please press the "Home" button, to deactivate you're wifi to fix issue, then resume play, thank you.
